thread.title: Trump and Carson's attacks on Muslims worry some GOP elders
thread.title_full: Trump and Carson's attacks on Muslims worry some GOP elders - San Francisco Chronicle

author: Steve Peoples, Associated Press
title: Trump and Carson's attacks on Muslims worry some GOP elders
text: Photo: Steven Senne, AP FILE - In this Sept. 30, 2015 file photo, Republican presidential candidate, businessman Donald Trump in Keene, N.H. Trump is canceling a scheduled rally in Virginia ahead of Hurricane Joaquin. Trump had been scheduled to attend a rally at the Wave Convention Center Friday evening in Virginia Beach. FILE - In this Sept. 30, 2015 file photo, Republican presidential... WASHINGTON (AP) — The candidates atop the GOP presidential field are ramping up political attacks aimed at Muslims, a move designed to appeal to hardline conservatives. But party elders worry that escalating anti-immigrant rhetoric could cost Republicans the White House in 2016. FILE - In this Sept. 30, 2015 file photo, Republican presidential candidate, businessman Donald Trump in Keene, N.H. Trump is canceling a scheduled rally in Virginia ahead of Hurricane Joaquin. Trump had been scheduled to attend a rally at the Wave Convention Center Friday evening in Virginia Beach. FILE - In this Sept. 30, 2015 file photo, Republican presidential... WASHINGTON (AP) — The candidates atop the GOP presidential field are ramping up political attacks aimed at Muslims, a move designed to appeal to hardline conservatives. But party elders worry that escalating anti-immigrant rhetoric could cost Republicans the White House in 2016.
